results.name: iiith-water-monitoring-version
results.label: Device information of Water Monitoring sensors in IIIT Hyderabad Campus
results.description: Device specific details and version information of Water distribution and flow monitoring system installations in International Institute of Information Technology, Hyderabad

dataDescriptor.dataDescriptorLabel: Device and Version specifications of Water Monitors in IIIT Hyderabad
dataDescriptor.description: Data Descriptor for device and version specifications of data parameters from Water Monitors in IIIT Hyderabad.

deviceID.description: Device ID of the water monitoring system corresponding to this observation.

deviceName.description: Device name of the water monitoring system corresponding to this observation.

versionName.description: Version name corresponding to the device in this observation.

startDateTime.description: Reported start time of the version corresponding to this observation.

endDateTime.description: Reported end time of the version corresponding to this observation.

versionSpec.description: Device specfications w.r.t. the version corresponding to this observation.

comments.description: User comments w.r.t the version corresponding to this observation.

versionSpec.compensatedTDS: DF Robot gravity Analog TDS Sensor/meter for Arduino
versionSpec.uncompensatedTDS: DF Robot gravity Analog TDS Sensor/meter for Arduino

versionInfo.comments: Version series beginning with 3 indicates it is a Type-1 water monitor, the series 2 indicates it is a Type-2 water monitor, the series 5 indicates it is a Type-3 water monitor and the series 6 indicates it is a Type-4 water monitor
